# Inline Formatting

This is **bold text** and this is *italic text*.

This is ***bold and italic*** together.

This is ~~strikethrough~~ text.

This is `inline code` within a sentence.

Here is a [basic link](https://example.com) and a [link with title](https://example.com "Example Site").

Here is an autolink: <https://example.com>

Combine them: **bold with *nested italic* inside** and *italic with **nested bold** inside*.

Escaped characters: \*not italic\* and \*\*not bold\*\* and \`not code\`.
